topics.body:
basically is this.


before putting the album on play, it encourages the reader to a certain page.

"this page is this one":http://becausetheinter.net/

which basically tells the person to read the screenplay as the album goes along.

it also gives a set of soundless short scenes that the person must connect with the songs he is told to.

this all connected together aims to create a big story within a small album.


now thats what i fucking call dedication.
